text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.B.DE143HIV-positive counselling conductedCounselling provided - HIV-positive counselling conducted
    HIV.B.DE144Hepatitis B positive counselling conductedCounselling provided - Hepatitis B positive counselling conducted
    HIV.B.DE145Hepatitis C positive counselling conductedCounselling provided - Hepatitis C positive counselling conducted
    HIV.B.DE146Syphilis counselling, treatment and further testingCounselling provided - Syphilis counselling, treatment and further testing
    HIV.B.DE147Linked to enrolment in care and ART initiationCounselling provided - Linked to enrolment in care and ART initiation
    HIV.B.DE148VMMC counselling providedCounselling provided - VMMC counselling provided

name: CounsellingprovidedCodes
title: Counselling provided Codes
description: Codes representing possible values for the Counselling provided element
